title: APG modal dialog example
description: This example implements a modal dialog.

steps.summary: navigate forward to the button to open the dialog

steps.observe: dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target

procedures.title: attempt to navigate backwards to content behind the open modal

steps.summary: navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
attempt to navigate backwards past the start of the dialog

procedures.title: attempt to navigate backwards to content behind the open modal

steps.summary: navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
navigate to the dialog container
attempt to navigate backwards past the start of the dialog

procedures.title: attempt to navigate forwards to content behind the open modal

steps.summary: navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
attempt to navigate forwards past the end of the dialog
navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
navigate to the modal container

procedures.title: Open the element list while the modal is open

steps.summary: navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
attempt to navigate to content behind the modal via the element list
navigate forward to the button to open the dialog
dialog will open and focus will be moved to the target
navigate backwards out of the open dialog
navigate forwards into the open dialog

chrome.output: "add delivery address, dialog, (dialog content), street: edit, type in text"

results.notes: The name and role were conveyed when entering the dialog for the first time.
The name and role were conveyed when entering the dialog for the first time.
conveyed implicitly by not being able to access content behind the modal.

chrome.output: not able to move outside of the modal
outside content was displayed in content lists, such as the of links, etc. Note: not possible to move to an item in the list.

results.notes: This is sort of fragile. If you use the mouse to click outside of the modal content, the modal stays open but shortcuts can be used to jump to outside content. It appears to work fine if keyboard was used exclusively.

results.notes: The name and role were conveyed when entering the dialog for the first time.

edge.output: not able to move outside of the modal
outside content was displayed in content lists, such as the of links, etc. Note: not possible to move to an item in the list.

results.notes: This is sort of fragile. If you use the mouse to click outside of the modal content, the modal stays open but shortcuts can be used to jump to outside content. It appears to work fine if keyboard was used exclusively.

ie.output: "add delivery address, dialog, street: edit, type in text"

results.notes: The name and role were conveyed when entering the dialog for the first time. The modal state was not
The name and role were conveyed when entering the dialog for the first time. The modal state was not
The modal state was not explicitly conveyed, but content outside the modal was obscured, which implies the dialog state.

ie.output: not able to move outside of the modal
outside content was displayed in content lists, such as the of links, etc. Note: it IS possible to navigate to headings in this list and break free from the modal.

results.notes: The title of the window was announced

firefox.output: outside content was displayed in content lists, such as the of links, etc.

results.notes: This is sort of fragile. If you use the mouse to click outside of the modal content, the modal stays open but shortcuts can be used to jump to outside content. It appears to work fine if keyboard was used exclusively.

results.notes: Not implied by content being limited to the modal. See other expectations for details.

edge.output: elements outside the modal were found
elements outside the modal were found
headings were found outside of the modal

chrome.output: "Add delivery address, dialog, street, edit, blank"

results.notes: Modal state was not conveyed but non-modal content was obscured which implies the modal state. See other expectations for details.

chrome.output: not able to move outside of the modal

results.note: This is fairly fragile. If you use the mouse to click on content under the modal, the content behind the modal can be found. This does not appear to happen when using just keyboard interactions.

chrome.output: no outside form fields were found
only content within the modal was included in the lists

results.note: This is fairly fragile. If you use the mouse to click on content under the modal, the content behind the modal can be found. This does not appear to happen when using just keyboard interactions.

firefox.output: "Add delivery address, dialog, street, edit, has auto complete, blank."

results.notes: Modal state was not conveyed but non-modal content was obscured which implies the modal state. See other expectations for details.

firefox.output: not able to move outside of the modal

results.notes: If you click content outside of the modal with a mouse, it is then possible to navigate that content behind the modal. This does not appear to be possible when using keyboard-alone.

safari.output: "out of add delivery address, web dialog, with 9 items"
some quotes could be found but not other content

results.notes: Only partial content was found, even after navigating out of the dialog via VO+shift+up arrow

safari.output: "First heading, Heading level 2, add delivery address"
only content within the modal was listed

firefox.output: "Add delivery address dialog, street, entry, focus mode"
content outside could be found ("add delivery address push button")
no outside form fields were found
outside links are listed. When jumping to those links, focus is redirected back to the open dialog.

results.notes: partial because outside links are listed but its not possible to jump to them.

history.message: re-tested all core versions, no significant changes were found
Added Narrator results for NVDA and JAWS, updated NVDA+Chrome results.
Added missing aria-modal results for JAWS+Chrome, JAWS+Edge
